oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Comments in the margins and "Mukhtaṣar al-farāʼiḍ" (ff. 109r-109v) in Arabic.

With: Dürr-i meknûn (ff. 1v-28r) ; Din ve Dünyaya nâfi yirmi üç hikmet (ff. 29v-32r) ; Vasiyet etmek hakkında risale (ff. 34r-37r) ; Ma'rūzāt (ff. 37v-50r) ; Kânûnnâme-yi cedide fî-mâ yete'allak bi'l-arâzî (ff. 50r-71v) ; Fetvâlar (ff. 77v-90r).
MS Turk 11. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Inheritance and succession (Islamic law)
